archive_description: Archive an URL or a .wacz file
unsupported_platform: This platform is not yet supported.
internet_archive_button: Archive this link with the Internet Archive
permacc_button: Archive this link using Perma CC. Not yet available.
fetch_error: Failed to fetch the media URL
upload_error: Upload error — An error happened with the file upload. Try with another file.
upload_extract_error: No captures could be extracted from the uploaded file.
upload_playback_error: Your WACZ was uploaded but LiveCDX is not available right now. We have your captures but we can't give you a playback URL.
file_error: File error — The file is not a .wacz file
archiving_error: An error happened while trying to archive the link. Please try with another link.
upload_loading: Loading... This can take up to a few minutes
upload_success: Your archive link was created successfully! Please take into account that the correct display of your archive on the Wayback machine may still require several minutes to process your WACZ file.
menu_wbm_step: Go to Archiving with classical tips
menu_wacz_step: Go to Archiving with WACZ file upload
step1_wacz_upload_subtitle: Continue with creating a WACZ file locally
step1_wbm_upload_subtitle: Archive the URL directly on the Wayback Machine
step2_wbm_subtitle: Capture the WACZ file manually using Webrecorder for best performance.
step2_wbm_dl_extension: Download the Webrecorder's archiveweb.page Chrome extension
step2_not_recommended_caption: Beta — May not work with all URLs
step2_scoop_subtitle: Use Scoop to download the WACZ file in 1 click.
step3_subtitle: Make sure the archive captured in the WACZ file worked. Use Webrecorder to replay the archive, and make sure the media is captured and readable.
step3_wbm_dl_extension: Download the Webrecorder's archiveweb.page Chrome extension
step3_radio_wacz: The WACZ file was correctly replayed by Webrecorder's ReplayWeb.page
step3_radio_wbm: There was an issue with replaying the archive (try another method)
step2_singlefile_set_telegram_subtitle: Use original link instead of browser URL
